name: Feedly Feeds Extended Experience Display-F.E.E.D.
description:
THIS...IS... err... FEEDLY! But unlike you've ever seen it!

Forget Google Reader, and all other programs trying to imitate it. This is new. Different. Better. This is the Pinterest of RSS readers. It's Full HD (1920x1080 with no space gone wasted), but also works (and improves Feedly) in lower res monitors as well. It's compact, dynamic, intuitive, smart. It's simply better than anything you ever saw, in any RSS reader.

This is F.E.E.D.

And it's free. 

You're welcome :-)
additional_info:
Design and code by Odysseas Kourafalos - aka Ducklord
An Uncensored|Media (uncensored.gr)creation for unregistered.gr

Version 0.76: "Throw momma from the train"

PLEASE, READ THE FOLLOWING UPDATE MESSAGE, or you may start wondering
where the heck your Feedly's menu has gone!


0.76 UPDATE: another change by Feedly, another fix by me.
Specifically, Feedly updated the way it displays its sidebar, so,
I changed the way the main article area "behaves". Now when you
hover over it with your mouse, it covers most of the screen. When
you move your mouse to the left, it "slides" to the right to reveal
the main menu.

Hope you like the changes and additions.
As always, I'm open to ideas and recomentations.

Best regards,
Odysseas Kourafalos
aka Ducklord

http://unregistered.gr
http://uncensored.gr
